str2: A primary preposition denoting the channel of an act; through.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Waiting at table; in a wider sense: service, ministration. From diakonos; attendance; figuratively aid, service.
According to the manner in which, in the degree that, just as, as. From kata and hos; just as, that.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To pity, have mercy on. From eleos; to compassionate.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To be faint, be weary. From ek and kakos; to be weak, i.e. to fail.
